pageContext.claim: “Drudge Report 'OBAMA KEPT THEM IN CAGES, WRAPPED THEM IN FOIL' We do a much better job while at the same time maintaining a MUCH stronger Border! Mainstream Fake Media hates this story.”
pageContext.analysis: The Obama administration was criticized for its treatment of Central American refugees, but what Trump is suggesting in this tweet is wrong. His administration also keeps some immigrants in caged enclosures and provides them with Mylar, or foil, blankets. Obama's administration did not systematically separate immigrant families, as Trump did.
